extras.title: Responsibilities Include
content: Be the artistic leader and take ownership for delivering high quality, distinction, and style for our environments.
Works closely with the Art Director and Lead Concept Artist to help drive the art style and evolve the vision of the project
Collaborate with the art team to implement and maintain the creative vision for the game
Develop the world that is worthy of a Netflix film/TV series
Design characters, props, production callouts, system interacts, high vision concept art, color scripts, marketing material and other visual guides and tasks as needed to assist the development team
Develop and maintain strong creative and collaborative partnerships across subject areas to help further develop the game
Proactively contribute to drive the department and studio to the forefront of pioneering Games development

extras.title: The Ideal Candidate
content: Minimum 10+ years of relevant experience with 3+ years of it being in a senior artist role.
Experienced in working with external outsource vendors (OS)
Has an excellent understanding of art pipelines, dependencies, and overall scope of the project
Strong communication skills and understanding of various art disciplines (animation, character, environment, VFX)
Experience designing detailed, modern and forward looking characters.
The ability to storyboard and help conceptualize character movement and VFX
You can arbitrate sensitively between creative desires and production requirements.
Excellent foundations skills, including composition, design, and color theory and advanced knowledge of human and animal anatomy.
Ability to design for a range of art directions, from photo realistic to stylized.
Strong ideation, brainstorming and documentation skills
Ability to find creative solutions for technically challenging tasks.

extras.title: Additional and Bonus Skills:
content: Good communication, organizational, and interpersonal skills
Experience with Zbrush and Maya
Experience with Epic's Unreal Engine
VFX concept experience
Passion for gaming
A passion and understanding of world building
Strong portfolio that demonstrates a range of 2D and 3D concepts
